examples.title: FizzBuzz
codes:
VAR i = 5;
IF i % 5 == 0 AND i % 3 == 0 THEN PRINT: "fizzbuzz" ELIF i % 3 == 0 THEN PRINT: "fizz" ELIF i % 5 == 0 THEN PRINT: "buzz" ELSE PRINT: i;

examples.title: Working with Numbers
examples.description: Numbers can be used in arithmetics and comparisons
codes:
VAR a = VAR b = 10;
PRINT: a + b;
IF i > 10 THEN PRINT: "i is greater than 10" ELSE PRINT:  "i is less than 10";

VAR j = 55;
IF i == j THEN PRINT: "i and j are equal";

examples.title: Working with Strings
examples.description: Strings can be concatenated and duplicated

examples.title: Working with Lists
examples.description: Lists can be appended and concatenated

examples.title: Working with Loops
codes:
VAR rocket = "🚀";
FOR i = 0 TO 10 THEN PRINT: rocket * i;
